title: AI for Finance – PwC Project for Banking Client (2025)
description: Built and maintained PySpark-based data pipelines on Cloudera to process and transform 1M+ monthly contract transaction records sourced from Hive tables for a banking client. The work focused on data preprocessing, feature preparation, and validation to support downstream machine learning and analytical models for branch-level financial trend analysis, with emphasis on data quality, business rule alignment, and scalability in a regulated environment.

title: IoT-Based Garden Monitoring & Maintenance System
description: Designed and implemented an IoT-based remote garden monitoring and maintenance system integrating traditional irrigation and hydroponic farming into a single platform. The solution combines sensor-equipped hardware nodes, Raspberry Pi control units, Firebase cloud services, and a Flutter mobile application to enable real-time monitoring, automated irrigation and nutrient dosing, remote control, and alert notifications, with a focus on system reliability and usability.

title: Promosee – Influencer Recommendation Platform (Bangkit Academy Capstone 2023)
description: Built Promosee, a cloud-native influencer recommendation platform that connects business owners with suitable influencers based on product categories and campaign objectives. The system integrates a content-based recommender and BERT-based sentiment analysis, exposed through a FastAPI backend deployed on Google Cloud Run with Firestore as the NoSQL database.

title: To-Be Enterprise Architecture Design – Manufacturing (Mulia Box)
description: Designed a To-Be Enterprise Architecture for a corrugated box manufacturing company, covering business, data, application, and technology architecture. The work included stakeholder analysis, value stream mapping, BPMN modeling, data entity design, and application–technology alignment, with a focus on improving production quality control and cross-division process clarity.

title: BudgetBuddies – Fintech & Financial Literacy Mobile Prototype
description: Designed and documented BudgetBuddies, a fintech and financial literacy mobile prototype developed as part of Bank Mandiri’s My Digital Academy program. The project focused on budgeting assistance, spending awareness, and financial habit building through user journey mapping, feature definition, and system documentation.

title: CPU & GPU Recommendation API – Backend System Design
description: Designed and implemented a backend recommendation API that suggests optimal CPU and GPU combinations based on user budget and brand preferences. The system applies benchmark-based scoring to prevent hardware bottlenecks, exposes secured REST endpoints with JWT authentication, and stores component data in a cloud-hosted MongoDB database.
